the mean (and the covariance) exactly if p(x) is Gaussian distributed (see
Section 6.5). This property is heavily exploited by the extended Kalmanextended Kalman
ﬁlter ﬁlter (Maybeck, 1979) for online state estimation in nonlinear dynami-
cal systems (also called “state-space models”). Other deterministic ways
